00031 namespace RDK2 { namespace RPrimitive {
00032     using namespace std;
00033     using namespace RDK2::Geometry;
00034     using RDK2::Object;

00036     RDK2_FACTORY(RDouble);
00037     
00038     static const char* d = "RDouble";
00039     const char * RDouble::myClassName() const {
00040         return d;
00041     }
00042     
00043     Object* RDouble::clone() const {
00044         RDouble * d = new RDouble(value);
00045         d->unit = unit;
00046         return d;
00047     }
00048     
00049     
00050     string RDouble::getUnitString(Unit unit)
00051     {
00052         switch (unit) {
00053         case REAL: return "";
00054         case PERC: return "%";
00055         case PERC_CYCLE: return "%/cycle";
00056         case M: return "m";
00057         case M_SEC: return "m/s";
00058         case M_SEC2: return "m/s^2";
00059         case M_CYCLE: return "m/cycle";
00060         case SEC: return "sec";
00061         case MS: return "ms";
00062         case RAD: return "deg";         // these are always saved, showed and loaded as degrees
00063         case RAD_SEC: return "deg/s";
00064         case RAD_SEC2: return "deg/s^2";
00065         case RAD_CYCLE: return "deg/cycle";
00066         case CELSIUS: return "C";
00067         case PIXELS: return "pixels";
00068         case OTHER: return "?";
00069         default: {
00070             ostringstream oss;
00071             oss << "(" << unit << ")";
00072             return oss.str();
00073         }
00074         }
00075     }
00076     
00077     string RDouble::getStringRepresentation() const
00078     {
00079         std::ostringstream oss;
00080         oss << setiosflags(ios::fixed) << setprecision(unit != SEC ? 2 : 3);
00081         switch (unit) {
00082             case RAD_CYCLE: case RAD_SEC: case RAD_SEC2: case RAD: oss << rad2deg(value); break;
00083             case PERC: case PERC_CYCLE: oss << value * 100.; break;
00084             default: oss << value; break;
00085         }
00086         return oss.str();
00087     }
00088 
00089     bool RDouble::loadFromStringRepresentation(const string& s)
00090     {
00091         std::istringstream iss(s);
00092         iss >> value;
00093         if (unit == RAD_CYCLE || unit == RAD_SEC || unit == RAD_SEC2 || unit == RAD) value = deg2rad(value);
00094         else if (unit == PERC || unit == PERC_CYCLE) value = value / 100.;
00095         return !iss.fail();
00096     }
00097 
00098     string RDouble::getStringForVisualization() const
00099     {
00100         std::ostringstream oss;
00101         oss << setiosflags(ios::fixed) << setprecision(unit != SEC && unit != RAD_SEC2 && unit != M_SEC2 ? 2 : 3);
00102         switch (unit) {
00103             case PERC: oss << value * 100. << " " << getUnitString(PERC); break;
00104             case PERC_CYCLE: oss << value * 100. << " " << getUnitString(PERC_CYCLE); break;
00105             case RAD_CYCLE: oss << rad2deg(value) << " " << getUnitString(RAD_CYCLE); break;
00106             case RAD_SEC: oss << rad2deg(value) << " " << getUnitString(RAD_SEC); break;
00107             case RAD: oss << rad2deg(value) << " " << getUnitString(RAD); break;
00108             case RAD_SEC2: oss << rad2deg(value) << " " << getUnitString(RAD_SEC2); break;
00109             default: 
00110                 oss << value; 
00111                 string unitStr = getUnitString(unit);
00112                 if (unitStr != "") oss << " " << unitStr;
00113                 break;
00114         }
00115         return oss.str();
00116     }

00119     bool RDouble::updateObject(ObjectUpdate* objupd)
00120     {
00121         istringstream iss(objupd->updateDescription);
00122         int u;
00123         iss >> value >> u;
00124         unit = (RDouble::Unit) u;
00125         return iss;
00126     }
00127     
00128     ObjectUpdate* RDouble::getObjectUpdate() 
00129     {
00130         ostringstream oss;
00131         oss << value << " " << (int) unit;
00132         ObjectUpdate* objupd = new ObjectUpdate;
00133         objupd->updateDescription = oss.str();
00134         return objupd;
00135     }

00137     void RDouble::read(RDK2::Serialization::Reader*r) throw (ReadingException) {
00138         r->startReading(getClassName());
00139             value = r->read_f64();
00140             unit = (Unit) r->read_i8();
00141         r->doneReading();
00142     }
00143 
00144     void RDouble::write(RDK2::Serialization::Writer*w) const throw (WritingException)  {
00145         w->startWriting(getClassName());
00146             w->write_f64(value);
00147             w->write_i8((int8_t) unit);
00148         w->doneWriting();
00149     }
